description: Synthetic policy outlining the refund process for canceled orders.

sections.title: Eligibility for Refund
sections.text: Refunds may be issued for canceled orders if the cancellation occurs within the allowable refund window specified at the time of purchase.

sections.title: Refund Processing Time
sections.text: Refunds are typically processed within 5â€“7 business days after the cancellation is approved. Processing time may vary depending on the payment provider.

sections.title: Payment Method for Refunds
sections.text: All refunds are sent back to the original payment method. Alternate refund destinations cannot be requested for security reasons.

sections.title: Refund Denials
sections.text: Refunds may be denied if an order has already been fulfilled, if the refund window has expired, or if the purchase violated terms of service.
